creator: Hvil ApS
descriptionHtml:
Hvil® is a sleep app that helps you sleep better and healthier. Through smart technology and data, we put together a sleep program that fits your lifestyle the best.

With Hvil® you get a digital sleep coach that supports you complete daily activities and change aspects that contribute to poor sleep.

Hvil® features:
- Your personal diary: Hvil® helps you track your sleep from day to day.
- A tailored program: You get personalized advice and guidance on how best to improve your chances of getting more and better sleep.
- Follow your progress: You can continuously see how your sleep habits and sleep quality are developing.
- Not a quick fix: Many solutions on the market promise faster results, while reality is different. It takes time to change habits.

** Privacy Policy & Terms of Use**
Read more about our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use here:
- Privacy Policy: https://hvil.app/privacy-policy
- Terms of Use: https://hvil.app/terms-and-conditions

** We would love to hear from you **
We love feedback and would like to hear about your experience with Hvil®. Write to us at: info@hvil.app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have some sleep-tastic updates for you!
You can now see when your next sleep window can be updated, and changing the sleep window is now better.
We also got rid of some bedbugs to help you get to sleep even easier than it already was!

We hope you have a fantastic day (and night).

Best regards, the Hvil team

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What a sleep-tastic update!

We've revamped the progress page and made it much easier to follow your program.
Look at all your different graphs once you've unlocked them, and get in-depth information with a single tap!

We've made it easier for new users to tell when your sleep program starts.

There were more bedbugs, so we called the exterminator to remove them.

Sleep tight, and enjoy!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello, sleep fans! We've been hard at work on optimising your experience in the app, so you can relax and improve your sleep even more easily.

Have a sleep-tastic day!

title: Hvil®

creator: Hvil ApS
descriptionHtml:
Hvil® is a sleep app that can help you sleep better and healthier.

Through smart technology and data, Hvil can create a sleep program that matches your lifestyle and needs the best. The sleep program is easy to get started with and cover several aspects of sleep, such as sleep hygiene, deactivation and cognitive exercises. The app works as a digital sleep coach that supports you in completing daily activities and changing sleep habits and aspects that contribute to poor sleep.


BENEFITS OF USING HVIL®


• A PERSONAL SLEEP DIARY
Hvil® helps you track your sleep from day to day through a digital sleep diary. You can easily input information about your bedtimes, sleep duration, sleep quality and much more.

• A TAILORED SLEEP PROGRAM
You can get tailored advice and guidance on how best to improve your chances of getting more and better sleep.

• TRACK AND FOLLOW YOU PROGRESS
You can follow how your sleep habits and sleep quality are developing, so you can see if the changes you make in your habits are having an positive impact on your sleep.

• NOT A QUICK FIX
Many solutions on the market promise faster results, while reality is different. It takes time to change habits.

• UNDERSTAND YOUR SLEEP
Hvil® offers a bunch of information sleep, what affects your sleep and gives you the tools to establish habits, behaviors and thoughts around your sleep so you can sleep better.



ABOUT HVIL® SUBSCRIPTIONS
Hvil® offers several types of subscriptions including a free version, a monthly subscription, and a yearly subscription paid upfront. Users have need to have either an monthly or an yearly subscription to get a sleep program.



PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF USE
Read more about our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use here:

Privacy Policy: https://hvil.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://hvil.app/vilkaar-og-persondata



WE WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU
Please send us any feedback or suggestions by writing to us at info@hvil.app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Hvil 1.5.2, your dedicated companion for enhanced sleep quality. This release focuses on refining your sleep experience with important bug fixes and UI optimizations.
Upgrade to Hvil 1.5.2 today and witness the improvements firsthand. Your journey to a better night's sleep is our top priority. Download now for a sleep experience like never before!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hvil Update 1.6.2 - Discover More, Sleep Better
We’re excited to introduce Hvil 1.6.2, packed with:

- New Explore Section: Discover targeted content related to specific components and programs to optimize your sleep journey.
- Bug Fixes: Improved stability and reliability.
- Optimizations: Enhanced performance for smoother use.

Update now to explore more and enhance your sleep experience.
